name: A Black Ankheg Shell
data: It increases the users strength poorly.
It decreases the users dexterity poorly.
It increases the users constitution slightly.
It decreases the users wisdom poorly.
It decreases the users intelligence poorly.
It has weak armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration a tiny bit.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users poison resistance somewhat.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'berserk'.
It increases the users acid resistance somewhat.
